text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://spor.ema.europa.eu/v1/lists/200000000004
  • Include all codes defined in http://spor.ema.europa.eu/v1/lists/200000000006
  • Include all codes defined in http://spor.ema.europa.eu/v1/lists/200000000007
  • Include all codes defined in http://spor.ema.europa.eu/v1/lists/200000000008

name: AuthorisedDoseForm
title: Authorised Dose Form
description: Value set for authorised dose form. Combines 4 SPOR/EDQM lists: Pharmaceutical dose form, Combined pharmaceutical dose form, Combined term, Combination package.
